I spent the last hour or two of the weekend.

Leading the charge is the most generic fighter I could make.

The fighters have been named for bugs for awhile. "Osuzumebachi" is a horrifyingly large and aggressive Japanese hornet.

daeCorp's colours have changed to emerald green on top and dark grey underneath with occasional silver highlights. Because black and neon lime green gets old fast.

i have a good feeling about this one.

deatals please!!!!!!!!

edit: that was suppose to be in all caps

The forum automatically takes away all caps:(

Improvements..

-A solid frame branching from the core.

-Claw on bottom for all round use.

-Lathe capable

-Ion engines still there

-Engines protected by armor

-RCS turning system replaced by non-outdated SAS

-Nukes moved closer into body.

-Total fuel reduced by 90(this is made up by the loss of all that RCS)

-Smaller opening at front.

-Part count reduced(I think)

Slightly different angle

Still needs.

-RCS

-Main weapons(deciding between I beams or 2 heavy missiles)

-Test run

-Launcher

-Action grouping

-Move AFMs closer to cockpit

Well she's perrty (I'm southern get over it) i ll give her that. I would go with different paint style though

Looks like the mid fuel tanks could use some cover too

What kind of armament does she have?

4 anti fighter missiles and either a metric **** ton of Rippers or two heavy torps. As for the outside tank, they're pretty well protected but if they get destroyed it doesn't matter as the only part that'll fall of is a nosecone:P

ok

so what do you plain to do with her?
I kinda want to enter although I don't have the time and it's started D: This looks really cool
Sorry for the inactivity i've had some hefty schoolwork.
I've also had to reinstall KSP to find a virus on my computer so all my previous ships are gone (however i think this is a new start and that i could make some really good ships now.
